pa-tagline: Integrated Telegram account management system: website admin panel, automated bot, access control and analytics in one product.
pa-problem-text: Managing multiple Telegram accounts for giveaways manually is inefficient and prone to errors. Users need anonymity, while administrators need centralized control and transparency without accessing sensitive user data directly.
pa-solution-text: I built a comprehensive system consisting of a Telegram bot for automated actions, a web-based admin dashboard for management, and a secure database. The system ensures safe participation in giveaways while providing real-time analytics.
pa-feat-1: Role System: Granular access control for admins and users.
pa-feat-2: Access Control: Secure login and action authorization.
pa-feat-3: Logging: Detailed logs of all bot and admin actions.
pa-feat-4: Automation Logic: Smart scripts for joining giveaways.
pa-feat-5: Monitoring: Real-time status of all connected accounts.
pa-concept-text: The main goal of the system is to automate account participation in giveaways, ensure user anonymity, and provide the administrator with full control through a web interface. The architecture is modular and scalable: new features can be added without rewriting the entire codebase.
pa-admin-li1: Create users with ID, name and username.
pa-admin-li2: Assign roles, restrictions and access levels.
pa-admin-li3: Link one or multiple accounts to a user.
pa-user-li1: Bot access is granted only after activation via the website.
pa-user-li2: Manage multiple accounts under one ID.
pa-user-li3: View statistics: participation, success rate, activity.
pa-user-li4: Secure workflow with codes and passwords.
pa-bot-li1: Automatically participates in giveaways: subscriptions, captchas, scripted actions.
pa-bot-li2: Tracks account activity and displays statistics to the user.
pa-bot-li3: Synchronized with the website via database: panel changes instantly affect the bot.
pa-bot-li4: Asynchronous processing allows managing multiple accounts simultaneously.
pa-bot-li5: Only active and authorized accounts participate in campaigns.
pa-db-struct-p: Users, accounts, statistics and logs. State is preserved after restart, analytics and export available.
pa-db-manage-p: Add, edit and delete users/accounts, control bot actions and permissions.
pa-db-ui-p: Tables, cards, filtering, activity visualization, hover effects and responsive navigation.
pa-sec-li1: Personal data is hidden and accessible only to the administrator.
pa-sec-li2: Account access is protected by codes and passwords.
pa-sec-li3: Bot and administrator actions are logged without exposing private information.
pa-sec-li4: Modular architecture reduces risks of errors and vulnerabilities.
pa-adv-li1: Centralized management of users and accounts.
pa-adv-li2: Automation of giveaway participation without routine manual tasks.
pa-adv-li3: Detailed analytics for accounts and users.
pa-adv-li5: Easy scalability and integration of new modules.
pa-gal-cap1: Admin dashboard: access, roles, action control.
pa-gal-cap2: User journey: Telegram interaction and participation scenarios.
pa-gal-cap3: Infrastructure: stability, data storage and scalability.
pa-res-text: This is not just a bot, but a full-fledged system: every action is under control, every account is protected, and the administrator sees the complete picture in real time. The solution is suitable for scalable automation, modular development and transparent Telegram account management.
